name: Fruit Tac Toe - Amazing Tic Tac Toe Game - XOXO
name_original: Fruit Tac Toe - Amazing Tic Tac Toe Game - XOXO
description:
Do you remember the Tic Tac Toe game we used to play in high school?

You get 3 X's or O's in a row and you win, it's that simple. This is the iPhone/iPad version for it. You can now challenge people around the world or play with friends over the Internet.

You can also play locally with your buddies when get bored - there's an option for that too.

There's also an option to play with a computer, but be careful, it's smart.

You can now stand out from the crowd by generating highest scores, based on "wins in a row!" All scores will be recorded on a Leaderboard so that everyone who plays the game can see your name on the top rankings.

It's FREE! Download this app now!
